title: If Kanye West stands for president will that help Trump, and is that the reason for his thinking? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kanye is a self promoter. His Presidential run stunt is just an effort to get an increasingly irrelevant name in the press for a couple more days/weeks. To think he might help Trump by siphoning off Black votes from Biden is, I would think, rather insulting to Black voters. If Paris Hilton ran for President, would Trump be worried about losing voters? Well, they’re both reality TV stars, so maybe. Okay, if Kid Rock ran for President, would Trump be worried? Eh…actually he might. Dang, the Republican bar has been set so low I’m having a hard time thinking of a White equivalent to Kanye who Trump voters wouldn’t go for like a bright shiny object. Scott Baio maybe? If Scott Baio ran for President under a platform of ‘Charles in Charge’ would Trump be worried? See, it’s a silly question.

That’s the strategy. The deluded and panicking Trump campaign think Kanye will take away black votes from Biden since Trump’s standing with them is so miserable. Ha ha, good luck with that one Donnie boy.
